com.google.code.gwt.database.client
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.google.code.gwt.database.client.Database

public final class Database
extends JavaScriptObject

Implements the Asynchronous Database interface, modeled after the W3C Web Database.

Usage

Start by obtaining a handle to a Database instance by calling openDatabase(String, String, String, int): 

 Database db = Database.openDatabase("testdb", "1.0", "Test DB", 10000);

From there, start a transaction: 

 db.transaction(new TransactionCallback() {
     public void onTransactionStart(SQLTransaction tx) {
         tx.executeSql(
             "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS contacts (" +
             "id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, " +
             "name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, " +
             "email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, " +
             "country VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL);", null);
     }
 });

See Also:
W3C Web Database, Safari Client-Side Storage - SQL Basics, Wiki - Quickstart Guide

Method Detail

isSupported

public static boolean isSupported()
Returns true if the Database API is supported on the running platform.

openDatabase

public static Database openDatabase(String shortName,
                                    String version,
                                    String displayName,
                                    int maxSizeBytes)
                             throws DatabaseException
Creates a handle to a Database instance.

Parameters:
shortName - (Short) name of the database
version - Version of the database
displayName - Descriptive name of the database
maxSizeBytes - The estimated number of bytes reserved for the database
Returns:
a Database instance
Throws:
DatabaseException - if the User Agent disallows Database access, or if the version is incorrect
See Also:
W3C Web Database - openDatabase

transaction

public void transaction(TransactionCallback callback)
Performs a SQL transaction on the Database in read/write mode.

Parameters:
callback - the callback implementing the transaction script
See Also:
W3C Web Database - transaction

readTransaction

public void readTransaction(TransactionCallback callback)
Performs a SQL transaction on the Database in read mode.

Parameters:
callback - the callback implementing the transaction script
See Also:
W3C Web Database - readTransaction

getVersion

public String getVersion()
Returns:
the current version of the Database (as opposed to the expected version of the Database object).
